Business_Process_Parameters.description: When set to "true" or "1", the business process is automatically processed. This means that all approvals will be automatically approved in the system, all reviews and to-do's will be automatically by-passed, and all notifications will be automatically suppressed.

Indicates the transaction should process to completion before the response is generated.  Note: All < v12 operations will process with Run_Now = True for backwards compatibility but please review this setting in your environment for performance conditions.

Enforces all validation conditions defined on the initiation step.  If any condition is true, the validation error blocks the step from exiting and a business process event isn't created. The attribute is currently not available for use. It will be generally available for all web services in a future release.

validation.validation: Discard on Exit Validation Error

The [Template] Template is not for category of performance review.  Please review a Template that is for performance reviews.
The [Template] Template is restricted to a conditional rule and the employee is not eligible for this Template (based on the conditional rule).
The review template you are trying to use has an inactive proficiency or rating scale.
Workday doesn’t currently support the Responsibilities or Career section type in employee review templates using Guided Experience.

Start_Performance_Review_for_Employee_Da.description: The date the review period began.  The period start date is required if the review template does not have a period start date specified.

validation.validation: Period Start Date cannot be populated when the [Template] Review Template doesn't contain a Period Start Date.  Please remove the Period Start Date from the request, or change the Review Template to a be a Review Template that allows for Period Start Date to be entered.
Period Start Date is required when the [Template] Review Template doesn't contain a Period Start Date.

Start_Performance_Review_for_Employee_Da.description: The date the review period ended.  The period end date is required if the review template does not have a period end date specified.

validation.validation: Period End Date cannot be populated when the [Template] Review Template doesn't contain a Period End Date.  Please remove the Period End Date from the request, or change the Review Template to a be a Review Template that allows for Period End Date to be entered.

validation.validation: Nominations cannot be saved unless 'Enable Nomination Tracking' is enabled.
Duplicate job entries are not allowed.  You must only enter each job once on this page.
Review Rating cannot be saved or displayed unless "Display Talent Matrix Review Rating" is enabled. Please enable or remove Review Rating for this web service request.
Talent Matrix Placement cannot be saved or displayed unless "Enable Manual Talent Matrix Placement" is enabled. Please enable or remove Talent Matrix Placement for this web service request.
Potential cannot be saved or displayed unless "Enable Manual Talent Matrix Placement" is disabled. Please disable or remove Potential for this web service request.
The Potential Assessment Value 1 field is not enabled.
The Potential Assessment Value 2 field is not enabled.
